name: Sudoku Revival
description:
Discover the new Sudoku Revival!
Unlimited free puzzles in varying levels that allow beginners and experts to enjoy each game. A clean, fresh look with sharp graphics. Get ready for the latest evolution of Sudoku and feed your addiction with each puzzle.

GAME CENTER

You can now compete against friends and all online players. See your scores, achievements, and rank.

THEMES

Three gorgeous themes are available so you can chose what better suits your mood.

SMART NOTES

Not sure which number goes in the box yet? Use the notes feature (the pencil) to write in multiple options inside the box.
The "Auto Update Notes" feature, when activated, will automatically remove previous notes once they are no longer viable options.

CONFLICTS DETECTION

The optional conflict detector tells you when you have entered an incorrect number by highlighting the conflicting boxes in red.

RESUME

You can start any game - from any of the available difficulty levels - and decide to stop and resume later. All your information will be saved and ready for you when you return.

MULTIPLE DIFFICULTY LEVELS

Up to 5 levels of difficulty are available: from Extra Easy to Evil, pick the puzzle that matches your skills.

ADD-ONS

The Magnifier tool allows you to reveal the number inside the box.

LIKE us on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/SudokuRevival

Thanks for playing!
